articles.author: Carly Johnson
articles.title: Sofia Vergara and co-judge Heidi Klum hit the red carpet ahead of America's Got Talent - Daily Mail
articles.description: America's Got Talent is inching closer to the finale. And judges Sofia Vergara and Heidi Klum looked eager to judge the remaining competitors during Tuesday's second semifinals round.
articles.content:
America's Got Talent is inching closer to the finale.

articles.author: Rachael Bunyan
articles.title: Afghan soldiers trained by UK and US forces have defected and are fighting for the Taliban, sources - Daily Mail
articles.description: British army officers have analysed recent images of the Taliban using their weapons and they believe some of the fighters are using techniques they learned from British and American forces.
articles.content:
Afghan soldiers who were trained by British and American forces have reportedly defected and are now fighting for the Taliban, UK army sources revealed.

articles.author: LEANDRA BERNSTEIN | Sinclair Broadcast Group
articles.title: Biden sows confusion by preempting FDA, CDC on booster shots - WCYB
articles.description: The Biden administration's preemptive push to get booster shots to Americans has created confusion about the need for additional jabs while opening the White House to criticism that it is interfering in the independent operation of public health and regulator…
